title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and the Frames should resize smoothly without excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically in the Control Example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
